Activity: Treat Batteries at End-of-Life

Description

Definitions:
End-of-life - stage which begins when the used product is ready for disposal, recycling, reuse, etc. and ends when the product is returned to nature (combustion, deterioration), or is recycled or reused. From ISO 23434-1:2021(en)
Industrial trucks - Sustainability - Part 1: Vocabulary

Notes:
For information about IDEF0 model repersentation of systems level engineering please see: Reslan, M., Last, N., Mathur, N., Morris, K. C., & Ferrero, V. (2022). Circular economy: a product life cycle perspective on engineering and manufacturing practices. Procedia CIRP, 105, 851-858. doi: 10.1016/j.jclepro.2023.139017.

References:
Bhar, M., Ghosh, S., Krishnamurthy, S., Kaliprasad, Y., & Martha, S. K. (2023). A review on spent lithium-ion battery recycling: from collection to black mass recovery. RSC Sustainability, 1(5), 1150-1167. doi: 10.1039/D3SU00086A.

Blömeke, S., Scheller, C., Cerdas, F., Thies, C., Hachenberger, R., Gonter, M., Herrmann, C., & Spengler, T. S. (2022). Material and energy flow analysis for environmental and economic impact assessment of industrial recycling routes for lithium-ion traction batteries. Journal of Cleaner Production, 377, 134344. doi: 10.1016/j.jclepro.2022.1334344.

Bruno, M., & Fiore, S. (2023). Material flow analysis of lithium-ion battery recycling in Europe: environmental and economic implications. Batteries, 9(4), 231. doi: 10.3390/batteries9040231.

Chen, M., Ma, X., Chen, B., Arsenault, R., Karlson, P., Simon, N., & Wang, Y. (2019). Recycling end-of-life electric vehicle lithium-ion batteries. Joule, 3(11), 2622-2646. doi: 10.1016/j.joule.2019.09.014.

Gaines, L. (2014). The future of automotive lithium-ion battery recycling: Charting a sustainable course. Sustainable Materials and Technologies, 1, 2-7. doi: 10.1016/j.susmat.2014.10.001.

Kallitsis, E., Korre, A., & Kelsall, G. H. (2022). Life cycle assessment of recycling options for automotive Li-ion battery packs. Journal of cleaner production, 371, 133636.

Ma, X., Meng, Z., Bellonia, M. V., Spangenberger, J., Harper, G., Gratz, E., Olivetti, E., Arsenault, R., & Wang, Y. (2025). The evolution of lithium-ion battery recycling. Nature Reviews Clean Technology, 1(1), 75-94. doi: 10.1038/s44359-024-00010-4.

Melin, H. E. (2019). State-of-the-art in reuse and recycling of lithium-ion batteries - A research review. Circular Energy Storage, 1, 1-57.

Song, J., Yan, W., Cao, H., Song, Q., Ding, H., Lv, Z., Zhang, Y., & Sun, Z. (2019). Material flow analysis on critical raw materials of lithium-ion batteries in China. Journal of Cleaner Production, 215, 570-581. doi: 10.1016/j.jclepro.2019.01.081.
